mapper.insert: insert into hotel_room_order (hotel_room_type_id, check_in, check_out, state, user_id) values (#{hotelRoomTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkIn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update hotel_room_order set hotel_room_type_id = #{hotelRoomTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, check_in = #{checkIn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, check_out = #{checkOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, hotel_room_type_id, check_in, check_out, state, user_id from hotel_room_order
select id, hotel_room_type_id, check_in, check_out, state, user_id from hotel_room_order WHERE hotel_room_type_id = #{hotelTypeId} and state = 1
select id, hotel_room_type_id, check_in, check_out, state, user_id from hotel_room_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} and state = 1
